wish: It won't come true if you say it out loud, silly!
I'm not feeling like doing anything right now. Sorry buddy.
I'm not your wish, why should I grant your wish?
I can't grant that, are you stupid?
Why should I grant you such a wish?
As if I would ever grant you a wish.
I doubt that would even be possible if I would try.
Your *wish* is my command. Ha, get it?
